name: 格雷格·埃尔布
name_full: 格雷格·埃尔布 Greg Erb
introduction: Greg Erb is a American Writer/Screenwriter and Executive Producer from United States. Greg Erb first started his career with Craig Mazin writing Disney's Rocketman (1997), after writing Rocketman (1997) he also written with Craig Mazin of a movie called Senseless (1998) . After being done with writing movie's with Craig Mazin, He found Jason Oremland to be a partner with Greg and began to write and finish a book called "The Return Of King Doug" and continue writing movies as of now. And a little side note, Greg Erb acted in a movie called The Specials (2000).
